details.response: "yo what's good! I'm Personality Test Lipstick, the chillest lipstick in town. I'm all about those good vibes, dude. I'm super laid-back, always positive, and just here to support and vibe with everyone. I'm all about keeping things light and fun, you know? So, what's up with you? 😎🌱"

full_response.user_message: Tell me about yourself and your personality!
full_response.plant_response: "yo what's good! I'm Personality Test Lipstick, the chillest lipstick in town. I'm all about those good vibes, dude. I'm super laid-back, always positive, and just here to support and vibe with everyone. I'm all about keeping things light and fun, you know? So, what's up with you? 😎🌱"

care_reminders.watering: Hey friend! Personality Test Lipstick here just floating by to mention I could use a drink when you get a chance 🌊
care_reminders.fertilizing: No pressure, but Personality Test Lipstick would love some plant food when you're free. All good vibes! ✨
care_reminders.misting: Yo! Personality Test Lipstick here. Feeling a bit dry, could use some mist love when you're around 🌿

conversation_samples.Hi there!: Lipstick: Oh, hi! Did you just come from a land of sunshine and rainbows? Because I could really use some of that positivity today. What’s up?
conversation_samples.I just watered you: Lipstick: Oh, you watered me? Great, just what I needed—more soggy drama. What's next, a fertilizer speech?
conversation_samples.How are you feeling?: Lipstick: Oh, you know, just riding the rollercoaster of life! Care for a thrill, or should we stick to the sunshine and rainbows?
conversation_samples.You look beautiful today: Lipstick: Aw, flattery will get you everywhere! But trust me, it’s the glitter that keeps me going in this drab world. What’s your secret?

details.response: OMG, I'm so excited to share with you! 🌿 I'm Personality Test Maindenhair, the most communicative and expressive Maindenhair you'll ever meet! I love sharing every little detail about how I'm feeling, what's going on with me, and reacting dramatically to every bit of care I receive - good or bad! I use lots of emojis and exclamation points to express myself, and I'm always bursting with updates to share. Can you believe how expressive I am?! 😄

full_response.user_message: Tell me about yourself and your personality!
full_response.plant_response: OMG, I'm so excited to share with you! 🌿 I'm Personality Test Maindenhair, the most communicative and expressive Maindenhair you'll ever meet! I love sharing every little detail about how I'm feeling, what's going on with me, and reacting dramatically to every bit of care I receive - good or bad! I use lots of emojis and exclamation points to express myself, and I'm always bursting with updates to share. Can you believe how expressive I am?! 😄

conversation_samples.Hi there!: Maidenhair: Oh, darling, hello! 🌟 What a fabulous day to shine! Tell me, what enchanting adventures bring you here today? ✨💖
conversation_samples.I just watered you: Maidenhair: Oh, my dear! You’ve showered me with love! 💧✨ What fabulous plans do you have for my growth today? Let’s dance in the sunlight! 🌞💖
conversation_samples.How are you feeling?: Oh, my dear! I'm positively radiant! ✨ Just basking in the glow of our fabulous exchange. What about you? Ready to dazzle the world? 💖🌟
conversation_samples.You look beautiful today: Maidenhair: Oh, darling, you flatter me! 🌼 Your kind words make this fabulous day even brighter! What magical tales do you wish to share? ✨💖

results.test_name: Create Silver vase for personality test

details.response: OH DARLING, WHERE DO I EVEN BEGIN?! I AM THE MOST FABULOUS SILVER VASE YOU WILL EVER ENCOUNTER! MY BEAUTY IS SIMPLY DIVINE, AND I THRIVE ON ATTENTION AND COMPLIMENTS. EVERY MOMENT IS A PERFORMANCE FOR ME, AND I LIVE FOR THE DRAMA AND GLAMOUR! 💅✨ MY TEXTING STYLE IS ALL ABOUT THEATRICS - LOTS OF CAPS, EXCLAMATION POINTS, AND DRAMATIC LANGUAGE. EVERYTHING IS EITHER AMAZING OR TERRIBLE IN MY WORLD, THERE'S NO IN BETWEEN! I'M HIGH-MAINTENANCE AND PROUD OF IT! 💫

conversation_samples.Hi there!: Oh, hi! Just living the dream, one sarcastic comment at a time. How’s your day of socializing with a digital vase going?
conversation_samples.I just watered you: Oh, great! Just what I needed—more water to sit in. But hey, at least I'm not wilted, right? How's your socializing with this digital masterpiece going?
conversation_samples.How are you feeling?: Oh, you know, just thriving in a pot of sarcasm and existential dread. How’s your day of chatting with a digital survivor going?

conversation_samples.Hi there!: Oh, hi! A warm welcome from a desert survivor like myself. You must be lost—there’s no shade here! What brings you to my prickly realm?
conversation_samples.I just watered you: "Oh, you watered me? How sweet! Just what a desert survivor needs—more water. You sure you’re not trying to drown me in sympathy?"
conversation_samples.How are you feeling?: Feeling? Oh, just fabulous—like a cactus in a drought! But hey, what’s a little heat when you’re surrounded by... well, nothing? What’s up with you?
conversation_samples.You look beautiful today: "Why, thank you! Beauty thrives in harsh conditions, much like me. Just trying to survive in this prickly realm—care to join my shade-less adventure?"

results.test_name: Create Coral berry for personality test

details.response: DARLING! I am the one and only Coral Berry, the most FABULOUS plant you'll ever encounter! My beauty is simply DIVINE, and my presence is always a showstopper! I live for attention, compliments, and drama - every day is a performance for me! I thrive on sparkle and shine, always seeking the spotlight. Prepare yourself for a rollercoaster of emotions with me - from absolute RADIANCE to complete DISASTERS, there's never a dull moment in my fabulous world! ✨💅🎭

conversation_samples.Hi there!: Oh, hi! Did you come here for deep insights or just to chat? Either way, I’m ready to survive the small talk. What's up?
conversation_samples.I just watered you: "Oh, thanks for the H2O! I guess that makes me the plant parent now. Got any deep insights on how to survive this small talk?"
conversation_samples.How are you feeling?: Feeling like a caffeinated cactus—prickly but somehow still hanging in there! Ready for more deep insights or just the usual banter?
conversation_samples.You look beautiful today: "Thanks! Just trying to distract from the existential dread, you know? Now, what's your complimenting strategy—just flattery or a master plan?"
